meanings.definition: Lacking sense, significance, or ideas; silly
meanings.sent1: The inaner joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her inaner behavior always brightened the room.
meanings.sent3: The inaner dance moves of the penguin brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: His inaner excuses for being late were as transparent as glass.
meanings.sent5: The inaner costume at the party was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The inaner details of the story were easily forgotten.
meanings.sent2: She found the inaner tasks at work to be a waste of time.
meanings.sent3: The inaner argument over who ate the last cookie was resolved with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The inaner decorations at the event failed to impress the guests.
meanings.sent5: The inaner gossip about her was quickly dismissed.
